actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations contained in section 212(B) of the Merchant Marine Act 1936, relating to mobile trade fairs.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for fiscal years 1981 through 1986 for providing technical and financial assistance to operators of mobile trade fairs designed to promote U.S. business and agricultural products overseas.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations contained in section 212(B) of the Merchant Marine Act 1936, relating to mobile trade fairs.
